text: John Stewart Herrington (born May 31, 1939) is an American Republican politician. He served as the United States Secretary of Energy under Ronald Reagan during his second term. ==Other websites== *Clean Energy Corp bio *Forbes profile Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Energy Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Stanford University alumni
title: John S. Herrington
